title: Replace SiteHeader logo with user-provided Linex Automation logo

requirements.summary: Ensure the header logo always renders the user-provided Linex Automation logo via centralized branding config and that the static asset is present.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx`, the header logo `` uses `src={BRANDING.logo.main}` and `alt={BRANDING.logo.alt}` (no hardcoded old logo path).
The static asset `frontend/public/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` exists in the deployed frontend build output and loads successfully (HTTP 200) when requested directly.
After deployment, the header logo displayed in the UI is the user-provided Linex Automation logo, not `linex-logo.dim_512x512.png`.

file_operations.description: Confirm `BRANDING.logo.main` points to `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` and keep `BRANDING.logo.alt` in English; ensure no reference to the old generated logo path remains here.

Ensure the specific header logo `` at the selected location uses `src={BRANDING.logo.main}` and `alt={BRANDING.logo.alt}` only (no hardcoded logo path, and no reference to `/assets/generated/linex-logo.dim_512x512.png`).
Add/replace the static asset so the deployed build includes `frontend/public/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` and it loads successfully when requested directly.
